pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Minecraft: Pi edition API Python Library`mcpi` Python library for communicating with [Minecraft: Pi edition](https://minecraft.net/en-us/edition/pi/) and [RaspberryJuice](https://github.com/zhuowei/RaspberryJuice).Visit [github.com/martinohanlon/mcpi](https://github.com/martinohanlon/mcpi) for more information.
